entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
